poem.title: Spring
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
One migrant doesn't constitute a quorum. You can lead a gypsy Caravan of camels to the slaughter But a swallow doesn't guarantee a drink.
A tripwire? Bang goes Terp- sichore. Things go better with Twerp The tomcat bound- ing through the temp- orarily long grass after that Flying stamp collection.
